Welcome to my website my name is Robin Aka Streats/ Streatsdesign. I have loved making things since I was little and that helped with getting header now drawing might not be my strongest point but creating and designing sure is I love every part of it and Webdesign even more so. I have a portfolio setup on this site and also school work because I still studie at school in Amsterdam.absolute. I live in The Netherlands and speak Dutch since I was born and raised here. Take a look around and please give me feedback if you would like to see something changed or what I can do! This website is coded by me with tailwind.
